resources.string: This is an extension for OI Notepad to support de- and encoding of QR Codes. It uses the IntentIntegrator library by zxing (http://code.google.com/p/zxing/wiki/ScanningViaIntent).
To scan a QR Code, edit a note and press menu > Scan QRCode. You can also generate a QR code by selecting text and pressing menu -> Generate QR Code
